# Improve Poison, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 3]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 0 ft.

**Target:** A poisoned item or vial of poison

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mageâ€™s Tower website

This spell improves a mundane poison, making it harder to resist. The DC increases by +1 per two caster levels (maximum +10 at 20th level).

*Greater improve poison* can be made permanent with the *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
